member.name: M:QuotesApi.Controllers.QuotesController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: List all public gists sorted by most recently updated to least recently updated.
member.remarks: With pagination, you can fetch up to 3000 gists. For example, you can fetch 100 pages with 30 gists per page or 30 pages with 100 gists per page.
